## IStandardDebugFlags.DEBUG\_DISABLE\_BREAKPOINT property

Prevents hitting assert / error breakpoints, useful when debugging tests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEBUG_DISABLE_BREAKPOINT: "DEBUG_DISABLE_BREAKPOINT";
```
